_comment: Sample conversion manifest showcasing defaults, master definitions, file rules, and revision metadata.

defaults._comment: Fallbacks applied to every IFC when no more specific rule overrides them.

base_point._comment: Base point expressed in projected units (meters by default).

masters._comment: Architectural master route referenced by defaults.master.
masters.name: Architecture_Master

masters._comment: Civil master with its own CRS, base point, and geodetic anchor.
masters.name: Civil_Master

files._comment: Route every IFC whose stem matches the glob to the civil master and override its revision/base point.
Explicit file override with its own projected/geodetic CRS and longitude/latitude anchor.
files.name: bridge.ifc
